text:
Southern Railway has announced change in the pattern of Train No. 16188 / 16187 Ernakulam Junction – Karaikal – Ernakulam Junction Expresses with effect from January 30 to February 10. This is to facilitate engineering works for removal of “Scissors Crossovers” at Ernakulam Junction. Train No. 16188 Ernakulam Junction – Karaikal Express will leave from Ernakulam Town from January 30 to February 9.

Train No. 16187 Karaikal – Ernakulam Junction Express will be terminated at Ernakulam Town on February 10, a press release said.
title: Change in pattern of express train
